meaningMnemonic: If the <radical>king</radical> gives you a <radical>knife</radical> you become part of his <kanji>squad</kanji>. Every king has a knife squad or two protecting him and making sure his subjects keep in line.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>squad</kanji> is led by <reading>Han</reading> (はん) Solo, so it's basically a 50/50 shot that the king is gonna die.
